title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-3.11 - Food service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-3.11 - Food service

State Regulations

Any food service operated by the campground operator or other food vendor shall meet the requirements of Part 14 of this Title. If the food service is operated by a food vendor other than the operator of the campground, a permit to operate in accordance with the appropriate Subpart of Part 14 of this Title must be obtained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
7-3.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
